title: Will NITs conduct offline classes for the first semester in 2020 given that IITs are going online? - Quora

response.answer_text: At this point of time classes in NIT's are also being conducted online. Offline classes will be conducted only when the conditions become better.
Depends on the guidelines of the government. Although online classes are going on already in almost every NITs and IITs (also in IIITS).
